Social welfare system in Ireland
An córas leasa shóisialaigh in Éirinn
What is the social welfare system in Ireland?
Céard é an córas leasa shóisialaigh in Éirinn?
How is it organised and who can apply for social welfare benefits? This document provides an overview of the system and includes links to more information
Cén chaoi a bhfuil sé eagraithe agus cé na daoine gur féidir leo iarratas a dhéanamh ar shochair leasa shóisialaigh?
Personal Public Service Number
Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí
Your Personal Public Service Number (PPS number) is a unique reference number that helps to you access social welfare benefits, public services and information in Ireland
Is uimhir shainiúil tagartha í d'Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí a chabhraíonn leat sochair agus eolas a fháil ó ghníomhaireachtaí seirbhíse poiblí in Éirinn
Information about how to appeal decisions about social welfare payments to the Social Welfare Appeals Office
Conas achomarc a dhéanamh in aghaidh cinntí a rinne an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí maidir le shocar agus theidlíochtaí
It was announced in Budget 2017 that a 85% Christmas Bonus will be paid in December 2016 to people getting a long-term social welfare payment
Fógraíodh i mBuiséad 2017 go n-íocfar Bónas na Nollag 85% i Nollaig 2016 le daoine a bhfuil íocaíocht fhadtéarmach leasa shóisialaigh á fáil acu

The new Public Services Card is designed to replace other cards within the public sector such as the free travel pass and the social services card of the Department of Social Protection and to make it easy for providers of public services to verify the identity of their customers

The new Public Services Card is designed to replace other cards within the public sector such as the free travel pass and the social services card of the Department of Social Protection and to make it easy for providers of public services to verify the identity of their customers
